inclusion.criterion: diagnosed with SCD genotype HbSS, HbSβ0, HbSC, or HbSβ+
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: regularly followed by the UMMC Pediatric SCD clinic
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patient in acute vaso-occlusive pain crisis

notes: The patient has a known history of sickle cell disease and is regularly followed by the UMMC Pediatric SCD clinic. However, it is unclear if they are currently in an acute vaso-occlusive pain crisis.
